name: Elder Pledge
desc: Contains the wrath of the elders, at least for a while.<q>This is a simple ritual involving anti-aging cream, cookie batter mixed in the moonlight, and a live chicken.</q>

name: Festive biscuit
desc:
Triggers Christmas season for the next 24 hours.
Triggering another season will cancel this one.
Cost scales with unbuffed CpS and increases with every season switch.'Twas the night before Christmas- or was it?

name: Ghostly biscuit
desc:
Triggers Halloween season for the next 24 hours.
Triggering another season will cancel this one.
Cost scales with unbuffed CpS and increases with every season switch.spooky scary skeletons
will wake you with a boo

name: Lovesick biscuit
desc:
Triggers Valentine's day season for the next 24 hours.
Triggering another season will cancel this one.
Cost scales with unbuffed CpS and increases with every season switch.Romance never goes out of fashion.

name: Fool's biscuit
desc:
Triggers Business day season for the next 24 hours.
Triggering another season will cancel this one.
Cost scales with unbuffed CpS and increases with every season switch.Business. Serious business. This is absolutely all of your business.

name: Bunny biscuit
desc:
Triggers Easter season for the next 24 hours.
Triggering another season will cancel this one.
Cost scales with unbuffed CpS and increases with every season switch.All the world will be your enemy
and when they catch you,
they will kill you...
but first they must catch you.

name: Century egg
desc:
You continually gain more CpS the longer you've played in the current ascension.
Cost scales with how many eggs you own.Actually not centuries-old. This one isn't a day over 86!

name: Permanent upgrade slot I
desc: Placing an upgrade in this slot will make its effects permanent across all playthroughs.

name: Permanent upgrade slot II
desc: Placing an upgrade in this slot will make its effects permanent across all playthroughs.

name: Permanent upgrade slot III
desc: Placing an upgrade in this slot will make its effects permanent across all playthroughs.

name: Permanent upgrade slot IV
desc: Placing an upgrade in this slot will make its effects permanent across all playthroughs.

name: Permanent upgrade slot V
desc: Placing an upgrade in this slot will make its effects permanent across all playthroughs.

name: Golden switch [off]
desc:
Turning this on will give you a passive +50% CpS, but prevents golden cookies from spawning.
Cost is equal to 1 hour of production.

name: Golden switch [on]
desc:
The switch is currently giving you a passive +50% CpS; it also prevents golden cookies from spawning.
Turning it off will revert those effects.
Cost is equal to 1 hour of production.

name: Milk selector
desc: Lets you pick what flavor of milk to display.

name: Golden cookie sound selector
desc: Lets you change the sound golden cookies make when they spawn.

name: Background selector
desc: Lets you pick which wallpaper to display.

name: Endless book of prose
desc: Fractal engines are twice as efficient.

name: Mice clicking mice
desc:
Cursors gain +5% CpS per fractal engine.
Fractal engines gain +0.1% CpS per cursor.

name: Sugar crystal cookies
desc: Cookie production multiplier +5% permanently, and +1% for every building type level 10 or higher.Infused with cosmic sweetness. It gives off a faint shimmery sound when you hold it up to your ear.

name: Tombola computing
desc:
Chancemakers gain +5% CpS per javascript console.
Javascript consoles gain +0.1% CpS per chancemaker.
